thread.title: Partial water supply disruption in Hyderabad on Mar 8; check affected areas
thread.title_full: Partial water supply disruption in Hyderabad on Mar 8; check affected areas

author: Newsmeter Network
title: Partial water supply disruption in Hyderabad on Mar 8; check affected areas
text:
Hyderabad: Hyderabad Metropolitan Water Supply & Sewerage Board (HMWSSB) on Wednesday announced a temporary water supply disruption in parts of Hyderabad on March 8, 2025.According to a press release, the existing PSC water supply pipeline near BHEL Junction will be shifted to another place owing to the construction of a flyover by the National Highway Authority of India (NHAI).The water supply will be disrupted in these areas: Erragadda, S.R. Nagar, Ameerpet, KPHB Colony, Kukatpally, Moosapet, Jagadgirigutta, RC Puram, Ashok Nagar, Jyoti Nagar, Lingampalli, Chandanagar, Gangaram, Madinaguda, Miyapur, Deepthi Sri Nagar, Beeramguda, Aminpur, and Nizampet.
